release_note: Refine the tempo detection algorithm used when converting audio to MIDI.
Pro Version users can now export recorded vocal melodies as Midi files Improve audio quality when recording through a Bluetooth device Bug fixes and UX improvements
Improved pitch detection. Pro version now has the ability to export sessions as lossless WAV files. Bug fixes.
Pinch to zoom. Fine tuner window. Ability to turn off note highlights in the settings panel. Improved pitch detection engine. Minor bug fixes.
Fixing the microphone bug that has been happening for some devices running iOS13.
Unlock record playback feature with the Pro Version.

Add the ability to pause. Add a configurable noise gate for filtering out background noises. Add support for portrait mode. The pitch detection algorithm has been improved. Support 60 fps on newer devices.
Fix crashes on newer devices such as iPhone11 and iPhone11 Pro.
